column1: When Congress returns to DC next week we need to pass a #COVID19 relief bill that provides:  → Direct relief to families → Another round of PPP for small businesses → Support for health care workers and hospitals → Vaccine distribution $$

Operation Warp Speed has been an unprecedented success. We now have several vaccines showing efficacy & safety in record time. This is American innovation and ingenuity at its very best! https://t.co/fIBmtXhgTN

The pandemic has taken a particularly tough toll on our small businesses & local restaurants. So today on #SmallBusinessSaturday I hope you will make an effort to #ShopSmall and support our local small businesses.

Since the beginning of the ongoing #COVID19 crisis the @OHnationalguard have been on the frontlines supporting relief & recovery efforts. FEMA OMB & DOD should provide federal $$$ so they can continue their good work.

As an avid outdoorsman I've worked hard to advance common-sense bipartisan solutions to protect our environment.   From protecting the Great Lakes to restoring our national parks to promoting energy efficiency we’ve had some major conservation victories this year.

The rapid development of #COVID19 vaccines has been unprecedented. I am proud to play a small role in the process by participating in a vaccine trial.   I think widespread vaccination is the most important thing we can do to return to normal life. https://t.co/FZvlwLQvHL

When the Senate reconvenes in Washington next week our top priority should be passing a bipartisan #COVID19 relief bill that provides the relief our schools workers families small businesses and health care professionals need.

To the doctors nurses other health professionals fire police EMS truck drivers grocery store workers and other heroes who have stepped up to keep us safe during this unprecedented crisis - Thank you God bless you and happy Thanksgiving!

This Thanksgiving please take a moment to think about and pray for the many American service members who will be spending the holiday far away from their homes & loved ones. They are a blessing.   We give them thanks for protecting our freedom and wish them a Happy Thanksgiving! https://t.co/HbKs87F3cK

This has been a trying year with the coronavirus that never seems to go away. But there are brighter days ahead especially with the vaccines likely to be available over the next few months.   Let us lift each other up. Together we will get through this. Happy Thanksgiving!

I love Thanksgiving because it's a time to be w family eat some of my favorite food & take time to reflect on & give thanks for our blessings.  Sometimes particularly during a tough year like this one we focus on the negative. Thanksgiving is a time to hold up the positive.
From our family to yours wishing you a happy Thanksgiving! https://t.co/Xi2gVlpTmR

This $46 million federal grant is great news for the Cleveland Clinic Foundation and NE #Ohio since it will help them continue to provide the health care folks need amid this ongoing #COVID19 health and economic crisis.

Pleased to see the entire ITC support keeping tariffs on foreign washing machines. I testified before the ITC earlier this month about how this will ensure a level playing field for Whirlpool’s worldclass work-force in Clyde OH. https://t.co/99b8NkqmSI
Vaccines are the key to returning to normal life. And thanks to President @realDonaldTrump’s Operation Warp Speed we are producing safe & effective #COVID19 vaccines at an unprecedented rate.
As we all prepare to enjoy the Thanksgiving holiday please remember to do your part to keep everyone healthy: wear a mask refrain from large gatherings & social distance. We’re #inthistogetherOhio

#Ohio’s craft breweries are a critical part of our state’s economy.   Let’s ensure they have the tax relief they need to stay afloat during this unprecedented health and economic crisis. https://t.co/GxqkFtW3AN
This is excellent news. My hats off to the Trump Administration for their leadership on Operation Warp Speed and all of those hard at work making this a reality. https://t.co/fIBmtXhgTN

Had a chance to safely visit the Centennial Marker in Gazebo Park commemorating the Lebanon Rotary Club's 100th anniversary.   This outstanding organization has supported and sustained the community for a century. Here's to the next 100 years! https://t.co/tQvdDetg5E https://t.co/NbhWWuoQYt

Grateful for the widespread support among maternal health leaders for my HEALTH for MOM Act.   This critical piece of legislation will improve maternal health outcomes for high-risk pregnant women and in doing so save countless lives.

Enjoyed touching base with the Kiwanis & Rotary Clubs of Lebanon today to discuss the #COVID19 situation in #Ohio the progress on the vaccine development front & my participation in a vaccine trial. https://t.co/ceZX0VqODU

As we approach this Thanksgiving holiday please remember to be careful! Continue to wear a mask refrain from large gatherings & practice social distancing. Taking these precautionary steps will help ensure you are able to keep yourself+your loved ones healthy over the holidays.

I enrolled in J&J’s #COVID19 vaccine trial to encourage others to join vaccine trials across the nation & to help give folks confidence in the safety & efficacy of these upcoming vaccines. https://t.co/6e2irm9hRu

Proud to lead a letter w @SenSherrodBrown & House colleagues urging FEMA OMB & DOD to support @GovMikeDeWine’s request to extend funding for the @OHNationalGuard to continue to play a critical role in #Ohio’s #COVID19 response effort. They have done an exceptional job.

#Ohio’s daily #COVID19 rate once again hit a new high. We are in the midst of an unprecedented crisis.   Congress must come together and pass another bipartisan #COVID19 relief bill ASAP. There is no time to waste.

Today on Public Health Thank You Day I hope you will join me in giving thanks for all of our exceptional public health professionals for their courage hard work and dedication throughout the ongoing pandemic. Thank you!!
My hope is that my participation in a vaccine trial will encourage folks to enroll themselves and give everyone more confidence in the safety & effectiveness of the upcoming #COVID19 vaccines.
My Cincinnati @enquirer op-ed on the path forward on the 2020 Election: https://t.co/LUeZCJxCyu

Earlier this wk I urged @USDOT & @USDOTFHWA to provide additional immediate support to repair & restore the Brent Spence Bridge over the OH River. This should be a wake-up call for the need to finally build a new bridge to replace a dangerous & functionally obsolete structure.

Operation Warp Speed is an innovative public-private partnership that is producing extraordinary results.   Multiple #COVID19 vaccines are showing efficacy & safety in record time. This will help save millions of lives. https://t.co/6TcZtJF1rS

Safe and effective vaccines are the key to defeating this virus.   They will enable us to reopen the economy go back to school and work and return to a more normal life.   Congress needs to pass a #COVID19 package to further support vaccine research and distribution.

The gridlock we have seen in DC over the past few months must be broken.   We are in the midst of a health care & economic crisis. It’s time to come together and pass a bipartisan #COVID19 relief bill. https://t.co/5vdQxT9S40
The @OhioStateFB and @GoBearcatsFB showed grit yesterday and are making Ohio proud! I think we’re ready for the College Football Playoffs!

I believe the vaccine is the key to defeating #COVID19.   Once a vaccine is widely available we will all be safer and be more comfortable returning to the workplace retail establishments restaurants and places of worship. https://t.co/pBmbAKDcNn

According to a recent survey only 58 percent of Americans feel comfortable getting an upcoming #COVID19 vaccine.   This is troubling because spreading immunity rather than the virus is key to saving lives and getting back to a more normal life.

Honored to receive the @nationalparkfdn's Hero Award. We must protect & preserve America’s national parks and public lands.   Thanks to my Restore Our Parks Act they will continue to stand tall for generations to come.

My hope is that my participation in a vaccine trials the solid science behind the FDA approvals and the positive initial reports of over 90 percent efficacy will make people more confident in the safety & effectiveness of a vaccine. https://t.co/Dny05k8VEX
The increase in unemployment claims are troubling. Congress needs to come together and pass a bipartisan #COVID19 relief bill immediately. Lives are at stake. https://t.co/TZSSP5Za9T
Looking forward to watching our undefeated Ohio teams on the field today - #3 @OhioStateFB and #7 @GoBearcatsFB. Go Buckeyes and Bearcats on their way to the College Football National Championship!

I enrolled in J&J’s vaccine trial because I believe it’s important to encourage others to join vaccine trials across the nation.  After all getting a safe & effective vaccine is the key to returning to normal life.

Honored to receive the @nationalparkfdn's Hero Award. Proud to work with the National Park Foundation to pass the Restore Our Parks Act and ensure the conservation of America’s beautiful national parks and public lands. https://t.co/2eeMWX9QjD

It was a pleasure to address the International Conservation Caucus Foundation’s event on combating wildlife trafficking.   I look forward to working with my friend @ChrisCoons to pass the End Wildlife Trafficking Reauthorization and Improvements Act. https://t.co/gqv7op7YBH

Recycling has many benefits – it creates jobs protects the environment and diverts material from landfills. That’s why I’m leading efforts to improve our nation’s recycling system with the #RECYCLEAct. Let's all do our part and recycle! #AmericaRecyclesWeek
The unemployment figures released today are quite concerning.   Congress must come together and pass a bipartisan #COVID19 relief package ASAP. https://t.co/ypwmxJXYUK
If you don’t normally file a tax return and haven’t received your $1200 economic impact payment yet please register by 3pm on Monday November 21 to make sure you receive it! https://t.co/ABjIjX5VSa
I will continue to work in a bipartisan manner to combat the global BDS movement and anti-Zionism. https://t.co/9ykPWe1Z9S

I applaud the Admin’s designation of the global BDS movement as anti-Semitism so that our taxpayer $ does not go to those who discriminate against #Israel or the Jewish people. https://t.co/9ykPWe1Z9S
Congrats to the Mariemont High School boys soccer team on winning the DIII state championship! Proud of how you all have represented Cincinnati! https://t.co/btu5zbP408

Concerned by the increase in unemployment claims this week.  As #COVID19 continues to surge this should spur Congress to act. Now is the time for both parties to work together to pass another bipartisan #COVID19 relief package. https://t.co/TZSSP5Za9T

Great news for the Dayton region & all of Ohio that the Nat'l Space Intelligence Center will be at @WrightPattAFB. The base continues to cement its standing as a hub for innovation & opportunity which means new jobs & continued growth for the Miami Valley. https://t.co/f2i4hlASwm

I’m honored to receive the @nationalparkfdn's Hero Award.   I appreciate the Foundation’s support for our bipartisan efforts to protect and preserve our national park sites through both the NPS Centennial Act in 2016 and most recently through my Restore Our Parks Act.

It is irresponsible and reckless to play politics with saving people’s lives. We all need to rally around the unprecedented progress the administration is making on #COVID19 vaccines. https://t.co/0jXccL4q09

In #Ohio & across the country the number of daily #COVID19 cases continue to increase.   The time for Congress to act is now. We must do more to address this health care crisis and help the economy. https://t.co/kKnJdVNkSA

My bipartisan #RECYCLEAct aims to inform folks about recycling programs in their communities. This bill can help meet EPA’s National Recycling Goal announced by @EPAAWheeler yesterday during #AmericaRecyclesWeek to achieve a national recycling rate of 50% by 2030.

Consumer confusion is one of the top challenges to improving our nation’s recycling rates. That’s why education is so important - it can help increase recycling and reduce contamination in the recycling stream.

Good piece from @venturebeat on the need for a nat'l AI research cloud. This would help ensure our technical researchers have the tools they need to innovate & pioneer. Precisely why Congress should pass our legislation to create a nat'l AI research cloud. https://t.co/iP5m1ZEDJo

The rapid development of #COVID19 vaccines would not be possible without the Trump Administration’s innovative Operation Warp Speed and the ingenuity and hard work of our researchers and scientists. https://t.co/xJTLavGZuV

This morning I spoke with @FoxNews @foxandfriends about my participation in the J&J vaccine trial and our overall progress is developing #COVID19 vaccines. I hope you will take a few moments to give it a watch: https://t.co/e55SshKR2z

I’m pleased @senatemajldr has called on Congress to work together to pass another bipartisan #COVID19 response package before the end of the year.   We can’t afford to wait any longer. The American people need relief now. https://t.co/IzXsMIhZli

I enrolled in J&J’s vaccine trial because I believe it’s my civic duty to encourage others to join vaccine trials across the nation & to help give folks confidence in the safety & efficacy of these upcoming vaccines. https://t.co/dh0AdaAleS

The incredible & unprecedented progress we’ve made in developing #COVID19 vaccines is a testament to the significant support provided by Congress the Trump Admin's innovative Operation Warp Speed & the commitment & ingenuity of our researchers scientists & manufacturers. https://t.co/drBTZI0oIC

Masks and social distancing are critical to slowing the spread and saving lives. But the key is getting #COVID19 vaccines safely authorized to allow for wide-scale vaccinations.   I encourage folks to join me in participating in vaccine trials. https://t.co/nF7dS0i0nF

I spoke w/ Interior @SecBernhardt today about the first deferred maintenance projects that will be funded under the Restore Our Parks Act. I’m pleased that he committed to providing more detail on these projects and that restoration of our parks and public lands can start soon.
That’s why I’ve worked with @SenStabenow on the #RECYCLE Act to educate folks about recycling programs in their communities and I appreciate @ISRI support.

Enjoyed speaking with members of the @ISRI Northern #Ohio chapter this afternoon during #AmericaRecyclesWeek.   Thousands of household and everyday products use recycled material so it’s important to ensure a strong recycling system. https://t.co/zHKgNKNYWW
Congress needs to set politics aside and pass a targeted #COVID19 relief bill.   With cases rising in #Ohio & across the nation we need to act and we need to act now. https://t.co/063XZo0AG5

Getting a safe & effective vaccine is the single most important thing we can do to beat #COVID19.   I encourage folks to participate in trials & feel confident in the vaccine once it is authorized by the FDA. https://t.co/6w9QMfl5kO

I hope that my participation in the Janssen-Johnson & Johnson phase 3 vaccine trial will encourage others to participate as well & help Americans feel confident of the safety & effectiveness of vaccines once they are authorized by the FDA.

Appreciate the widespread support among maternal health leaders for my HEALTH for MOM Act.   By improving maternal health outcomes for high-risk pregnant women this critical piece of legislation has the potential to save countless lives.

I am encouraged by the progress we are seeing in the various vaccine trials.   A testament to the power of American scientific innovation and the support Congress has provided to the development of safe and effective vaccines. https://t.co/uQ9thSZ2N1

Pleasure speaking with @JobsOhio and local leaders from Lima about the importance of a thriving #JSMC in Lima and as well as all of #Ohio’s military installations.   These military & defense #jobs play a key role in our state's economy and our broader national security. https://t.co/FhM11kyncb

The rapidly rising number of #COVID19 cases in #Ohio and across the nation underscore the need for us to set aside politics and pass a targeted #COVID19 relief bill.   Let’s come together and get it done. https://t.co/ac6POyVdON

Just sent a letter asking @USDOT & @USDOTFHWA Nicole Nason for additional immediate support to repair and restore the Brent Spence Bridge.  The bridge is critical to SW Ohio's economy. It's imperative we get it fixed up and operational as quickly as possible.
This #AmericaRecyclesWeek I urge my colleagues to pass my #RECYCLEAct to ensure folks know about their residential and community recycling programs. We all need to do our part and recycle!

I believe we should continue to invest in testing and contact tracing so that states are better equipped to respond to this surge of #COVID19 outbreaks.   This is something both sides agree on and something that is needed in every corner of this country. https://t.co/Ozutq9wUbn

The rapidly rising number of #COVID19 cases in #Ohio and nationwide highlight the need for Congress to set aside partisan politics and pass a #COVID19 response and relief package. https://t.co/QkOkUeScWV

Can’t wait to watch the @Bengals game this afternoon. Let’s burrow in and keep the momentum going to bring home another W!

We cannot continue to allow #China to steal our taxpayer-funded research and IP.   It’s time to pass the Safeguarding American Innovation Act to protect America’s investment in research and IP. https://t.co/vYrJxJ5gYk

Earlier this week I was proud to vote to confirm Judge Jim Knepp as the next federal judge for the Northern District of #Ohio. As I told Jim on the night of the vote I advocated for him because he has served the people of Toledo and Ohio with honor and distinction.

Tax reform regulatory relief new trade deals unleashing American energy & other pro-growth policies helped fuel one of the strongest & broadest economic expansions in US history.  These policies should serve as the foundation upon which we rebuild our economy moving forward.

The $12M @USDOT grant will provide immediate assistance for repairs to the recently damaged Brent Spence Bridge.   I’ll keep helping on these repairs but this should be a wake up call to all of us that it is time for a new safer bridge.

Heartbreaking news. Jane and I are praying for the families of the five American service-members killed in the helicopter crash in Egypt including Staff Sgt. Kyle McKee from Painesville #Ohio. May they rest in peace. https://t.co/lY1Dv0u6WC

I commend the DOJ & FBI for taking action to hold #China & their operatives accountable as we called for in our 2019 bipartisan #PSI report.   Now let’s pass the Safeguarding American Innovation Act to ensure our taxpayer-funded IP & research is protected.

Great news: This $12M @USDOT grant will help repair Brent Spence Bridge. Thanks to @SecElaineChao.   I will continue to work to help secure the resources needed to get the bridge operational as quickly as possible as well as an eventual long-term replacement.
Great to see $1.62 million in federal #CARESAct funding being put to good use in Franklin County #Ohio to help keep #jobs at 65 small businesses in the area.  https://t.co/9WMdI8UzUh

Grateful for the widespread support among maternal health leaders for my HEALTH for MOM Act which will improve maternal health outcomes for high-risk pregnant women. Let’s pass this bill and save lives.

Having a safe holiday means planning ahead so that you and your loved ones can gather safely. The incubation period of #COVID19 is long so do your part to limit risks by reducing gatherings and wearing a mask now to have a meaningful Thanksgiving in two weeks.

As we all prepare for the holiday season please continue to wear a mask refrain from large gatherings & practice social distancing. With #COVID19 cases continuing to rise we all have to do our part to slow the spread!

Great article highlighting my friend @SenAlexander & his lasting impact on U.S. education policy.   It has been an honor working alongside Senator Alexander these past eight years. I wish him all the best moving forward. https://t.co/pKpBYQzdxH

Let’s put aside the politics and build a targeted bipartisan #COVID19 relief bill based on what we all agree works.   We can’t afford to delay any longer. American lives are at stake. https://t.co/TQa2k4GSBW

It’s time to pass my bipartisan Safeguarding American Innovation Act - which will go a long way towards protecting America’s vital taxpayer-funded research and intellectual property.

Many thanks to the first responders who helped with the Brent Spence Bridge accident earlier today.   I am monitoring the situation closely & will work with local state & federal officials to help provide the resources needed to ensure any damage is quickly repaired.

Honored to address the #VeteransDay ceremony at Dayton’s @DeptVetAffairs Medical Center. Please join me in thanking all those who have answered the call to serve our nation & protect our freedom. We are eternally grateful for your service & sacrifice. https://t.co/wv0c4rARl5

Yesterday #Ohio recorded more than 6500 new cases of #COVID19. This economic and health care crisis is far from over. As I have said consistently we must come together and provide Americans with the relief they need.
Thank you to all the men and women who have stepped up to protect our nation and the freedoms we enjoy as Americans every day. #VeteransDay https://t.co/S2YkRO2JVh

Today we celebrate the 245th birthday of the @USMC.    The proud and brave men and women of the Marine Corps continue to protect our way of life and honor the rich history of the Corps.    Semper Fidelis Marines and Happy Birthday!
I’m pleased the Senate has confirmed Judge Jim Knepp to be the next federal judge in the Northern District of #Ohio.  I’m confident he will serve the people of Ohio with honor and distinction.

Allowing a fair and transparent process is important to providing Americans more assurances of the integrity of the election and helping the country heal after a contentious campaign. I hope the states and the courts will move expeditiously to a resolution.

The historic turnout in last wk's election is a testament to the health of our democracy.  Votes are still being counted & POTUS has every right to insist all legally cast ballots are counted with recounts where appropriate & to go to court over questions about irregularities.

Great to celebrate the groundbreaking for the expanded National Air and Space Intelligence Center at @WrightPattAFB after fighting to secure the funding for this project.   This new facility will play a key role in keeping this nation safe. https://t.co/8wtXURRL6G
Our courts and legal system are set up to resolve any disputes in accordance with the law. Then once the final count has been completed we will abide by the results as we always have as Americans.
As states work through counting the remaining ballots both parties must be able to observe the process as always and any evidence of illegal activity should be investigated immediately.
Seems pretty straightforward: Every ballot cast in accordance with state law should be counted. Those that are not cast in accordance with state law should not be counted.

NASIC's Intelligence Production Center III at @WrightPattAFB plays a key role in protecting our nation by ensuring our armed forces have the intel they need to carry out their missions.   Proud to have fought to secure the $$ for this facility in last yr's defense funding bill.

Good luck to the @Bengals as they take on the @Titans this afternoon. This team is so close to breaking out. Let’s bring home a W behind Joe Burrow!
